title: Esme and the Money Grab
description: Esme has had enough… Mr. Galloway has pushed her too far. You try working for him… Pushed to her limits, Esme quits… Events propel her back to her old job, but it’s not available anymore because Mr. Galloway has died. Esme does what any girl in her situation would do, she decides to live with the corpse. It’s safer and cozier than going back to her apartment. Mr. Galloway was a very wealthy man. It all goes well until she meets the man of her dreams… Landon. Esme and the Money Grab is a standalone dark romantic comedy with a guaranteed happy ending.Themes: True Love, Dark Humor, Rags to Riches, Grief, Death & Dying, Stalking,
author: Paloma Meir
